20101228234513.000|20101228234520.000|CC1|BUT NOT EVERYONE FIND IT A      
20101228234520.000|20101228234520.000|CC1|THRILL.

20101228234522.000|20101228234523.000|CC1|WANTS IT BANNED.                
20101228234523.000|20101228234525.000|CC1|ALLEN WHO HAS LIVED IN THE AREA 
20101228234525.000|20101228234527.000|CC1|FOR 27 YEARS, SAYS AS MANY AS   
20101228234527.000|20101228234528.000|CC1|200 SPEED BOARDERS A WEEK       
20101228234528.000|20101228234530.000|CC1|INVADE THE HILLS AROUND HIS     
20101228234530.000|20101228234530.000|CC1|HOME.                           
20101228234530.000|20101228234532.000|CC1|>> SO SOME OF THEM COME AROUND  
20101228234532.000|20101228234533.000|CC1|HERE AND BECAUSE THEY CAN'T     
20101228234533.000|20101228234534.000|CC1|HOLD IT, THEY WILL GO OFF INTO  
20101228234534.000|20101228234536.000|CC1|THE BUSHES THERE, OR THEY WILL  
20101228234536.000|20101228234538.000|CC1|GO OFF INTO THE CANYON OVER
